source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: Motion Graphics: Make Liquid Motion Effects in After Effects

visible_instructors.title: Video Course Center Inc.
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality Training: Motion Graphics, Video Editing
visible_instructors.name: Video Course Center

items.headline: You will learn how to create Awesome Liquid Motion Effects & Liquid Text Effects in Adobe After Effects from scratch!
objectives_summary: Create amazing liquid text effects in Adobe After Effects
Learn how to use Masks to create amazing effects in After Effects
Learn how to use After Effects built-in effects for create liquid handwriting text effect

items.title: Your First Day in NUKE: Up and running fast
items.headline: NUKE FAST TRACK: Make your first compositing in 20 minutes, get up and running with the industry standard in compositing
objectives_summary: Nuke compositing in 20 minutes
Color correction tricks
Roto power with the Roto node and Rotopaint node

items.title: Low Poly Modeling in Cinema 4D - Vol 2: 3D Cars and Vehicles
items.headline: Learn to model and texture beautiful low poly cars, trucks, buses, trains, and boats in Cinema 4D. The easy way!
objectives_summary: Create beautiful low poly vehicles using Cinema 4D.
Understand the low poly modeling pipeline in Cinema 4D.
Texture low poly objects using selection sets.

items.title: Learn & Create 3D models in just 2 hours (School Students)
items.headline: A complete course for Kids - 3D SLASH
objectives_summary: Introduction to CAD - 3D Slash
Signup Process
Navigation with and without mouse

items.title: Blender 2.8: Mastering hard surface modeling
items.headline: Learn how to use a non-destructive workflow to create highly detailed hard surface models all in Blender 2.8.
objectives_summary: Basics of blender 2.8
Advanced hard surface modeling workflows
Modifiers useful for hard surface modeling such as bevel and weld modifier

items.title: Sci-fi Character Armor - Blender 2.9 and Substance Painter
items.headline: Fast and Effective Modeling and Texturing Techniques For Hard Surface Character Outfits
objectives_summary: Fast 3D modeling techniques in Blender 2.9
Modeling hard-surface character armor
Tips to maintain proportionally correct outfits

items.title: Work Smart With Nuke! Episode 1: Channels & Roto
items.headline: Learn to composite like a pro VFX artist
objectives_summary: Understand RGB colorspace
De-mistify the merge node with math
Avoid roto mistakes

items.title: Blender VFX Tutorial: Rig & Animate a Realistic Car in Real
items.headline: Create Photorealistic CGI Visual Effects Animations in Blender
objectives_summary: Create Realistic VFX Effcts in Blender
Learn the 5 Rules for Having an Excellent Car Rig in Blender
Master Camera Matching using fSpy to Match any Background Scale

items.title: Logo Text Animation Using Shapes in After Effects
items.headline: Learn how to create your very own logo text animation using shapes in After Effects!
objectives_summary: Animating your very own text logo or name using shapes in Adobe After Effects.
Animation principles such as squash & stretch.
How to use physics to give your animation a sense of weight.

items.title: How to Create High Quality 3D Scanned Model
items.headline: This course will make help you create professional 3d scanned models for games, movies or other CG Projects.
objectives_summary: This course will help you create professional 3d scanned models for games, movies or other CG Projects.

items.title: Portrait Drawing Course: Digital Portrait In Ps

visible_instructors.title: Alejandro Encisso
visible_instructors.name: Alejandro
visible_instructors.job_title: For Those Who Have The Insaciable Need To Draw

items.headline: A Simple But Efective Method To Create: Digital Realistic Portrait In Photoshop Or Procreate, Digital Drawing
objectives_summary: You will learn how to manage photoshop for graphic artists
learn to create the constructive lines of a portrait
learn how to create the shading

items.title: Learn to animate. Part 2. "Human Walk Cycle".
items.headline: Build Human walk cycle. Body bounce, weight balance, arm and head swing, elbow overlap.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will learn typical Animation workflow: "Layout-Blocking-Rough Animation-Polish", use Graph Editor as your main Animation tool, know how to create apearance of body balance, create overlap by shifting the splines and using In-betweens, use foot controls, deal with knee snapping of CG characters.

items.title: Autodesk ReMake and Nuke Worflow
items.headline: Create a Stunning Bullet Time Shot, Using Autodesk ReMake and Nuke.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you’ll be capable of creating incredible 3D photo-realistic looking shots within few hours. The techniques you will learn in ReMake can be used as well to work on a model with other softwares or even 3D print your scan.

items.title: 3ds Max + VRay : Automotive Studio Lights

visible_instructors.title: Jamie Cardoso
visible_instructors.name: Jamie
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert in 3D Lighting, Rendering, 3ds Max, V-Ray, VR, PS

items.headline: 3d+3ds max + 3d Rendering + V-Ray+3d Lighting+Shading/Texturing + Photorealistic Interior + 3dsmax+ Vray+ Photoshop
objectives_summary: Learn Groundbreaking Techniques on how to Create Photorealistic Studio Lights and Materials using 3Ds Max, V-Ray & Photoshop
Create Shaders Realistically
Texture Procedurally

items.title: V-Ray for Rhino
items.headline: Photo-realistic Rendering for Rhino
objectives_summary: High quality photo-realistic rendering for objects / scenes made in Rhino

items.title: Learn 3D Modeling From Scratch in Blender
items.headline: You'll learn how to model in Blender by Creating a full Robot Model from Scratch! No Prior Knowledge Required. Ready! GO
objectives_summary: Build an entire robot from start to finish, but first you'll learn how to Download and install blender on your computer.
Learn the basics of the interface of blender, how to manipulate objects and navigate in 3D space.
Work with polygonal objects and learn about their different components.
